summary: This mod basically adds a friendly dragon to your game that will fight any enemies.
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS MY FIRST MOD AND IT IS A WIP!!!!!

This mod basically adds a friendly dragon to your game that will fight any enemies.
Nonvulzii means "noble spirit" in dragon tongue meaning that these dragons are noble and swore fealty to the dovahkiin during the dragon wars, kind of like Paarthurnax 

WILL NO LONGER GET ATTACKED BY FOLLOWERS...[size=1] mostly. [/size][size=2]Most of the time during testing he wasn't being attacked but I think that if he accidentally hits you they will attack him, but that's the same with all npc[/size]

This is the very first version of the mod and I will list known issues, bugs, problems annoyances below. If you find one that I have missed please tell me


-He/She will attack anything that is closest, because those mudcrabs are probably more important than that dragon
-CAN BE FOUND AT SHRINE OF AZURA!! To spawn with console commands, press ~ key, type help Nonvulzii, you will get an id then type player.placeatme id 1. Id is the id you got and 1 is how many you want to spawn.
author: INpure-
